WHY CHOOSE US

We prioritize customer satisfaction above all else. Our team of dedicated
professionals is always ready to provide personalized assistance, excellent
customer service, and prompt support. We strive to exceed your expectations at
every step.

Efficiency meets sustainability

We believe that collaboration is key to achieving a sustainable future. We
actively seek partnerships with like-minded organizations, industry experts,
and customers to promote knowledge sharing, innovation, and best practices.
Together, we can drive positive change and create a more sustainable baking
industry.

Learn More __

Sustainability meets design

We understand that every business has unique design requirements. That's why
we offer customization options to tailor our sustainable equipment to your
specific needs. Our team collaborates with you to incorporate your branding
elements, color schemes, and design preferences, ensuring that the equipment
seamlessly integrates into your space.

Learn More __

Design meets precision

Precision is at the core of our design philosophy. Every aspect of our
equipment, from the finest components to the smallest details, is meticulously
crafted with precision in mind. We leave no room for error, ensuring that our
products meet the highest standards of accuracy, reliability, and performance.

Learn More __

About Us

Zhuhai Qinli Machinery Co., Ltd. is a company that integrates R&D,
manufacturing, sales, and service of baking equipment. We started operating in
2013 and specialize in manufacturing bakery equipment, including continuous
industrial bread forming lines for various products such as tortillas, burger
buns, hot dog buns, long loaf bread, baguette bread, as well as different
types of machines like dough divider elevators, dough divider rounders,
intermediate proofers, moulders and panning machines, sesame dusting machines,
and naan bread machines. With a commitment to using technological innovation
as the core driving force, QL Machinery continually introduces new products,
resulting in the acquisition of numerous invention and utility model patents.
Our products have been well received by domestic and international customers
due to their durability. Inspired by the principle of "SERVICE MAKES VALUE,"
QL Machinery wholeheartedly provides high-quality products and services for
the baking industry.

Learn More __

About Our Products

Over the years, our products have gained a strong reputation within the baking
industry. Our customers rely on us for top-quality equipment that consistently
delivers outstanding results. We have earned the trust and loyalty of numerous
clients, both domestically and internationally, through our commitment to
excellence.

  * ##  Vaccum Dough Divider Elevator QLSV-300

Vaccum drive dough divider, release inner air and feeding continuously.

  * ##  Dough Divider Rounder QDMS-2

Weight range 28-200g, capacity 1,500-3,000 pcs/h. QDMS-2 dough divider rounder
is an economic version dough balls making machine with 2 rows, suitable for
bakery shop.

  * Dough Divider Rounder QLDR-6

Weight range 28-130g, capacity 6,000-12,000 pcs/h, QLDR-6 dough divider
rounder is a heavy duty dough ball dividing rounding machine, making dough
balls with 6 piece one time, error less than 2g.

  * Dough Divider Rounder QLDR-5

Weight range 28-130g, capacity 5,000-10,000 pcs/h, QLDR-5 dough divider
rounder is a heavy duty dough ball dividing rounding machine, making dough
balls with 5 piece one time, error less than 2g.

Product Video

Welcome to our product video section, where you can get an immersive look at
our exceptional range of baking equipment. Through our carefully crafted
videos, we aim to showcase the features, functionality, and benefits of our
products.

  * Dough Divider Rounder QLDR-4

  * Dough Divider Rounder QLDR-5

  * Dough Divider Rounder QLDR-3
